thread.section_title: Houzz Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Houzz | www.houzz.com
thread.title: Christine

author: Christine
title: Christine
text: Every time I open a email from Houzz, I'm excited to discover content that offers helpful tips and opens up a world of ideas. My husband and I are in the planning process for the home we hope to start building this year and every single email contains more than one article that is tremendously useful to us. And the tools which help to bring our ideas to life are nothing short of amazing. Not to mention the wide range of offerings in the Houzz store! Keep up the fantastic work.
